Uses of Interface
jparsec.graph.chartRendering.Graphics

  • Packages that use Graphics 
    Package Description
    jparsec.graph.chartRendering
    Provides classes for sky and planetary rendering.

    • Uses of Graphics in jparsec.graph.chartRendering

      Classes in jparsec.graph.chartRendering that implement Graphics 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AWTGraphics
      Implements the Graphics interface for Java desktop platform, with anaglyph support and optional sub-pixel precision.
      Methods in jparsec.graph.chartRendering that return Graphics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Graphics Graphics.getGraphics()
      Returns a copy of the current Graphics provider.
      Graphics AWTGraphics.getGraphics() 
      Graphics Graphics.getGraphics(int w, int h)
      Returns a copy of the current Graphics provider, but with a different size.
      Graphics AWTGraphics.getGraphics(int w, int h) 
      Methods in jparsec.graph.chartRendering with parameters of type Graphics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void RenderEclipse.lunarEclipseMap(TimeElement time, ObserverElement observer, EphemerisElement eph0, Graphics g, SatelliteRenderElement.PLANET_MAP map)
      Creates a chart with only the map of a lunar eclipse.
      void RenderPlanet.renderize(Graphics gg)
      Renderize a planet.
      void RenderSky.renderize(Graphics gg)
      Renderize the sky to another device.
      void RenderSatellite.renderize(Graphics g)
      Renderize a satellite.
      static void RenderEclipse.renderLunarEclipse(TimeElement time0, ObserverElement obs, EphemerisElement eph0, Graphics g, boolean horizontalCoord, SatelliteRenderElement.PLANET_MAP map)
      Creates a chart with a scheme of a lunar eclipse and optionally also the eclipse map.
      void RenderEclipse.renderSolarEclipse(TimeElement.SCALE outputTimeScale, ObserverElement obs, EphemerisElement eph0, Graphics g, boolean horizontalCoord, SatelliteRenderElement.PLANET_MAP map)
      Creates a chart of a solar eclipse with an scheme of the eclipse and optionally also the map.
      void RenderEclipse.solarEclipseMap(TimeElement.SCALE outputTimeScale, ObserverElement observer, EphemerisElement eph0, Graphics g2, SatelliteRenderElement.PLANET_MAP map)
      Creates an image only with the map of a solar eclipse.
